mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.star AS "star", a.nps AS "nps", a.sort AS "sort", a.orderstop AS "orderstop", a.address AS "address", a.ordersarea AS "ordersarea", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.createuser AS "createuser", a.state AS "state", a.worktype AS "worktype", a.groupid AS "groupid", a.storeid AS "storeid", a.taskpackageid AS "taskpackageid", a.elactricationid AS "elactricationid", a.pointXy as "pointXy1", a.project_mode as "projectMode", a.order_stop_reason as "orderStopReason", a.order_stop_operator_employee_id as "orderStopOperatorEmployeeId", a.order_stop_reason_type as "orderStopReasonType", a.order_stop_operate_datetime as "orderStopOperateDatetime"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_employeegroup( star, nps, sort, orderstop, address, ordersarea, createtime, createuser, state, worktype, groupid, storeid, taskpackageid, elactricationid, pointXy, project_mode, order_stop_reason_type, order_stop_reason, order_stop_operator_employee_id, order_stop_operate_datetime ) VALUES ( #{star}, #{nps}, #{sort}, #{orderstop}, #{address}, #{ordersarea}, #{createtime}, #{createuser}, 0, #{worktype}, #{groupid}, #{storeid}, #{taskpackageid}, #{elactricationid}, #{pointXy1}, #{projectMode}, #{orderStopReasonType}, #{orderStopReason}, #{orderStopOperatorEmployeeId}, NOW() )

mapper.update: UPDATE biz_employeegroup SET star = #{star}, nps = #{nps}, sort = #{sort}, orderstop = #{orderstop}, address = #{address}, ordersarea = #{ordersarea}, createtime = #{createtime}, createuser = #{createuser}, state = #{state}, worktype = #{worktype}, groupid = #{groupid}, storeid = #{storeid}, taskpackageid = #{taskpackageid}, elactricationid = #{elactricationid}, pointXy=#{pointXy1}, project_mode=#{projectMode}, order_stop_reason_type=#{orderStopReasonType}, order_stop_reason=#{orderStopReason}, order_stop_operator_employee_id=#{orderStopOperatorEmployeeId}, order_stop_operate_datetime = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
